item.title: PS2 Tools
item.author: Alan Cortez
item.description: PS2 Tools Requirements: - Memory Card with FreeMcBoot installed. - Usb drive. Tools PS2 Retroarch Emulators for Sega, Gameboy, Famicom, etc. Just copy and paste to usb drive. http://buildbot.libretro.com/nightly/playstation/ps2/ OPL Manager Manage roms (PS1 and PS2), add art covers. Then copy and paste to usb drive. https://oplmanager.com/site/ PSXVCD This application will help with converting PS1 games images (.zip, .7z, .rar, .ecm, .bin, .cue) into VCD to use it with POPStarter).
